name: Liquid Flame
description:
Game Notes:

Welcome to Liquid Flame! Where you are a orange flame person with the ability of water! Try to get the end and make it to the house to be safe from the toxic slimes!

-----------------

Updates:

 - Speed Boosts

 - Trails

 - Hidden Flashing Donut 

-----------------

Controls:

 - Left Arrow Key To Walk Backwards.

 - Right Arrow Key To Walk Frontwards.

 - Press Space To Jump.

 - Hold Space To Jump High.

-----------------

Logs:

 - Update 1!

-----------------
